filesDescription: İnteraktif videonuzda kullanmak istediğiniz bir video eklemek için aşağıdaki bağlantıyı tıklayın. Video linki ekleyebilir ya da video dosyalarını yükleyebilirsiniz. Farklı kalitelerde birkaç versiyon eklemeniz mümkündür. Tarayıcılarda maksimum desteği sağlamak için en azından webm ve mp4 formatlarında bir sürüm ekleyin.
startScreenOptionsLabel: Ekran seçeneklerini (desteklenmeyen Youtube videoları için) başlat
hideStartTitleLabel: Video başlama ekranı üzerindeki başlığı gizle
shortStartDescriptionDescription: İsteğe bağlı. Video başlama ekranında bir kısa açıklama metni göster. Youtube videoalrında çalışmaz.
posterDescription: Kullanıcı videoyu başlatmadan önce görüntü gösterildi. Youtube videoları için çalışmaz.
copyrightDescription: Videonun telif hakkı ve videoda kullanılan maddelerle ilgili bilgiler.
textTracksLabel: Metin parçaları ( desteklenmeyen Youtube videoları için)
labelDescription: Used if you offer multiple tracks and the user has to choose a track. For instance 'Spanish subtitles' could be the label of a Spanish subtitle track.
srcLangLabel: Source language, must be defined for subtitles
srcLangDescription: Must be a valid BCP 47 language tag. If 'Subtitles' is the type of text track selected, the source language of the track must be defined.
displayTypeDescription: Button is a collapsed interaction the user must press to open. Poster is an expanded interaction displayed directly on top of the video
htmlWidgetLabelDescription: Label displayed next to interaction icon.
seekToDescription: Enter timecode in the format M:SS
allowOptOutLabel: Allow the user to opt out and continue
seekToNumberDescription: Enter timecode in the format M:SS
allowOptOutOnWrongLabel: Allow the user to opt out and continue
requireCompletionLabel: Require full score for task before proceeding
requireCompletionDescription: For best functionality this option should be used in conjunction with the "Prevent skipping forward in a video" option of Interactive Video.
boxShadowDescription: Adds a subtle shadow around the interaction. You might want to disable this for completely transparent interactions
timeDescription: The target time the user will be taken to upon pressing the hotspot. Enter timecode in the format M:SS.
visualizeDescription: Show that interaction can be clicked by adding a border and an icon
displayAtDescription: Number of seconds before the video ends.
startVideoAtDescription: Enter timecode in the format M:SS
loopDescription: Check if video should run in a loop
showSolutionButtonDescription: This option determines if the "Show Solution" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.
retryButtonDescription: This option determines if the "Retry" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.
showBookmarksmenuOnLoadDescription: This function is not available on iPad when using YouTube as video source.
preventSkippingLabel: Prevent skipping forward in a video
preventSkippingDescription: Enabling this options will disable user video navigation through default controls.
deactivateSoundDescription: Enabling this option will deactivate the video's sound and prevent it from being switched on.
defaultAdaptivitySeekLabelLabel: Default label for adaptivity seek button
continueWithVideoLabel: Default label for continue video button
requiresCompletionWarningLabel: Warning that the user must answer the question correctly before continuing
singleInteractionAnnouncementLabel: Text explaining that a single interaction with a name has come into view
multipleInteractionsAnnouncementLabel: Text for explaining that multiple interactions have come into view
